title: Structuring Your Novel - From Basic Idea to Finished Manuscript
description:
Chapters:
1. How to Develop an Idea into a Novel and Test It
2. How to Develop the Basic Conflict
3. How to Develop a Plot or Story Line
4. How to Select the Right Viewpoint
5. How to Develop a Theme
6. How to Employ Exposition
7. How to Employ Description
8. How to Employ Narration and Action
9. How to Characterize
10. How to Write the First Chapter of a Novel
11. How to Hold a Reader's Interest
12. How to Employ Craftsmanship: Part I
13. How to Employ Craftsmanship: Part II
14. How to Employ Symbolism
15. How to Develop Your Own Style
16. The Future of the Novel
